sst_event.h File Reference

#include <sst_base_def.h>

Typedefs

 The datatype used to carry signal value in the SST event.

typedef SST_Event_Tag SST_Event_T
 The datatype used to carry SST event information.

Detailed Description

A header with definition of the SST event.

Requires sst_base_def.h (user supplied) header.

Typedef Documentation

SST_Event_T

The datatype used to carry SST event information.

This is a structure with two fields:

  • sig - signal value of the event of type SST_Signal_T
  • par - parameter value of the event of type SST_Param_T

SST_Param_T

The datatype used to carry parameter value in the SST event.

To achieve maximum efficiency it is defined as a CPU_Base_T type.

SST_Signal_T

The datatype used to carry signal value in the SST event.

To achieve maximum efficiency it is defined as a CPU_Base_T type.
